page.title: 06Schools Of Rufforth Children
page.content: We found out how many people are educated in{Rufforth parish.}34 pupils are educated at{Rufforth County {Primary School.}26 children go from {Rufforth}to{Wetherby High School}which is a{Leeds Education Authority {Comprehensive School.}18 other children from{Rufforth}go to a School in{York}to attend either{private}day school or{boarding}schools or { {catholic}schools.The new{Rufforth {school}is 13 years old.There are 46 pupils.There are 3 teachers.We have 2 classrooms with a study and cloakroom.The largest room is the hall which is used for eating,assembly and P.E.There is a book corner and a staffroom.Outside there are 2 large fields,climbing frame and a playground. The{yew trees}at school are{300 years old and are{protected.
